participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, enjoys engaging in conversations and getting to know people.
participant_1.background: Emily is a graphic designer who loves movies and often spends her weekends watching films or reading.

participant_2.personality: Laid-back and thoughtful, prefers intimate conversations over small talk.
